title: Migrate routers to oRPC handlers
description:
Convert tRPC routers to oRPC:

src/lib/trpc/todos.ts → src/lib/orpc/routers/todos.ts
src/lib/trpc/projects.ts → src/lib/orpc/routers/projects.ts
src/lib/trpc/users.ts → src/lib/orpc/routers/users.ts

Pattern changes:
- router({...}) → plain object with procedures
- .input(zodSchema) → .input(arktypeSchema)
- TRPCError → ORPCError
- ctx → context

title: Migrate from tRPC + Zod to oRPC + Arktype
description:
Migrate the tanstack-db-electric-bun starter from tRPC with Zod validation to oRPC with Arktype validation. Use alkhidmah-digital-platform as reference implementation.

CURRENT STATE:
- tRPC v11 with Zod v4 validation
- drizzle-zod for schema generation
- 3 routers: todos, projects, users
- Collections call trpc client for mutations

TARGET STATE:
- oRPC with Arktype validation
- drizzle-arktype for schema generation
- Same functionality, cleaner patterns

REFERENCE:
- /Users/masrurimz/Projects/alkhidmah/alkhidmah-digital-platform/apps/web/src/lib/orpc/

title: Migrate db/schema.ts from drizzle-zod to drizzle-arktype
description:
Convert schema generation from Zod to Arktype:

CURRENT: drizzle-zod with createSchemaFactory
TARGET: drizzle-arktype with createSelectSchema/createInsertSchema

Type inference changes from z.infer to typeof Schema.infer

title: Create oRPC API handler route
description:
Create src/routes/api/rpc/$.ts (or src/routes/api/$.ts)

- RPCHandler or OpenAPIHandler
- Mount router with context
- Remove old src/routes/api/trpc/$.ts

title: Update package.json dependencies
description:
Remove tRPC deps, add oRPC and arktype deps:

REMOVE:
- @trpc/client
- @trpc/server
- drizzle-zod
- zod

ADD:
- @orpc/server
- @orpc/client
- @orpc/openapi (optional, for docs)
- arktype
- drizzle-arktype

Same for projects and users collections
